text: would this be a JSON file in the file manager? or a JSON file in the CMS project alongside react components
ah wait i see, generating a URL not actually getting the file itself

if the JSON file is in the project, can you try importing it with `?url` at the end? i think that will result in a static URL like you’re looking for. for most static assets you don’t need the `?url` but because JSON can be parsed it doesn’t default to that behavior
I was hoping to use a file in “design manager” - in the root dev directory or in a folder.
i see - ok there’s functionality there we don’t have today in JS projects but good to know!
